results.title: Measure metric: length 3: the final test
results.brief_description: Demonstrates how to estimate the lengths of various objects. Demonstrates estimation, measurement, recording, selecting an appropriate instrument, and using equivalents and decimal notation. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
results.description: Demonstrates how to estimate the lengths of various objects. Demonstrates estimation, measurement, recording, selecting an appropriate instrument, and using equivalents and decimal notation. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Measure metric: length 2: a thousand clicks
results.brief_description: Demonstrates how to measure circular objects and record the answers using decimal notation, how to measure lengths that are more than one metre, and how to use the trundle wheel to measure a kilometre. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
results.description: Demonstrates how to measure circular objects and record the answers using decimal notation, how to measure lengths that are more than one metre, and how to use the trundle wheel to measure a kilometre. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Measure metric: length 1: who measures?
results.brief_description: Two teenage boys explore metric measurement in downtown Toronto. Demonstrates proper length-measuring technqiues, using the appropriate measurement instrument, and learning the linea equivalents of 1m, 10cm, 1000cm. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
results.description: Two teenage boys explore metric measurement in downtown Toronto. Demonstrates proper length-measuring technqiues, using the appropriate measurement instrument, and learning the linea equivalents of 1m, 10cm, 1000cm. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Measure metric. Vol. 3. Doc Cranshaw and the kid: the winner
results.brief_description:
The grandson of a medicine man wins a contest by mastering metric volume measurement. Demonstrates the use of formula, the relationship and the principle of water displacement to determine the volume of non-rectangular objects.
Suitable for middle and upper primary level.

results.title: Measure metric. Vol. 2. Doc Cranshaw and the kid: the contest
results.brief_description:
Demonstrates metric measurement of volume, using litres, millilitres, cubic centimetres and cubic decimetres. Includes a variety of processes for determining the volume of a rectangular solid.
Suitable for middle and upper primary level.

results.title: Measure metric. Vol. 1. Doc Cranshaw and the kid: the medicine show
results.brief_description:
A medicine man and his grandson learn about metric measurement from residents of a Utah frontier town. Demonstrates the litre and the millilitre and methods for determining the volume of liquid and granular substances.
Suitable for middle and upper primary level.

results.title: Measure length
results.brief_description: Two boys who explore their neighbourhood with a metre stick and a centimetre rule discover the comparative size of things around them. Explains the importance of measuring length and defines the standard metric unit.

results.title: Meaning of percentage
results.brief_description: Gives an introduction to the meaning of percentage by relating it to the student’s previous understanding of fractions and decimals.
